text: @charliekirk11 The COVID19 ID cards are farcical. They're only good for the exact moment they're issued. Walk out the door & ya could catch it. Sooo braindead..... like showing one's parents negative pregnancy test proves 1 not sexually active - or - displaying neg STD test results proves safe.
